column5: Fun and eclectic apartment blocks away from downtown Denton! We are located right next to the DART, which can take you into downtown Dallas. The unique/historical vibe of Denton is at your doorstep. There is a wide variety of food and drink options within walking distance (approximately 5 min walk). In our apartment, you have all of the necessary amenities at your fingertips. We live in a loft style apartment and do not have any pets or smoke. A couch is available for a third guest if needed.
